name: massivedecks
description: Pulls together both the server and client for Massive Decks, a comedy party game.
author: Reread Games <team@rereadgames.com>

scripts.install: npm run intallServer && npm run intallClient
scripts.build: cp -r server/decks decks && npm run buildServer && npm run buildClient
scripts.nuke: npm run nukeServer && npm run nukeClient && rm -rf node_modules decks package-lock.json
